targets.rawSql: SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY , NOW(), timestamp)*-1 as metric FROM portfolio ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(id) as metric FROM portfolio;
SELECT COUNT(id) as metric FROM portfolio WHERE timestamp < (UTC_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 1 DAY);
SELECT COUNT(id) as metric FROM portfolio WHERE timestamp < (UTC_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL 1 WEEK);

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  success AS "S"
FROM job
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM job;
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio";
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap";
SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), timestamp)*-1 as MinutesAgo, job as Job, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Duration, error as Error FROM job WHERE Success = 0 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM job WHERE success = 0;
SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM job WHERE success = 1;
SELECT job as Job, COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM job GROUP BY job ORDER BY Count DESC;
SELECT timestamp as time, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Portfolio FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio" ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT timestamp as time, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Portfolio FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap" ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio";
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio";
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio";
SELECT COUNT(id) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio" AND success = 0;
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap";
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap";
SELECT TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap";
SELECT COUNT(id) as metric FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap" AND success = 0;
SELECT lifetime as Lifetime, working_time as WorkingTime, failed as Failed, successful as Successful FROM worker;

SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), timestamp)*-1 as "Hours Ago", job as Job, success as Success, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Duration, error as Error FROM job WHERE job = "daily" OR job = "pnl" OR job = "fng" OR job = "daily_push" OR job = "cbbi" ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp as time, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Portfolio FROM job WHERE job = "portfolio" ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT timestamp as time, TIME_TO_SEC(duration) as Marketcap FROM job WHERE job = "marketcap" ORDER BY id ASC;
